11.content:
Daven opens the new mail. One of the letters say: Showdown at Nox Arena. Bring your weapons, your friends, and your army. If you don't show up, we'll move the Showdown to your house. Signed, Daven's Worst Enemy.

"Who can be my worst enemy? I'm nobody. The only person who knows I exist is Kit, my one and only friend."

Kit twirls into the room holding a basket of laundry over her head.

"What's wrong?" Kit asks Daven.

"I've got enemies," Daven says. "What should I do?"

12.content:
Since I guess this is where you create yoru own character I guess then I'll create mine.

My name is Xen, I am a gladiator held here in the arena against my will. I've been here for so long that I have forgoten all that I once was. When ever I enter the arena and hear the crowd roar I know that they are not cheering for me but yet they are cheering for my death. Savages. All of them. Blood thirsty and hungry for death. I only wish I could shove them in here and feed them to the vile and twisted monsterosities I've faced.
12.title: You decide

122.content:
Xen meets Daven
Daven was thrown into the prison where Xen was being held. Xen thought he was going into the arena for another match. The message he got was a big surprise to him.
Xen: Who goes there!
Daven: It is me Daven Kat. I have come to set you free from this prison from which you were sent out of your will.
Xen: What! No I don't believe you. You probably came to force me to fight for my life for some entertainment.
Daven: Shh quiet you will awaken the guards.
Xen: What?
Daven picks Xen's lock and escapes from the cell.
Xen: Who are you? What is the purpose of saving me?
Daven: I would much appreciate a thank you. Now the guards will be after us any minute. We must hurry.
Xen: Whatever.
Kit the dancer was waiting outside.
Kit: (thinking) "He should be out any minute.

What happens next?

14.content: Your name is Daven, who is 21 years of age. He has dark brown hair and hazel eyes. You are warring a black ninja outfit with a couple of ninja stars on the back. You walk into the area to find out that you are fighting...
14.title: Daven walk into the arena

141.content:
continue
Daven walks into the arena where there is a crowd of people. He wasn't sure where to go but he invited his friend Kit. Daven looked around and saw a table with a sign up sheet. Daven walked up to the table and noticed that there were three lines. One line was short, one was long and one was very long. Daven walked to the short one.
After a couple of minutes Daven was finally at the desk. He was face to face with a manager. The manager loked him up and down and said, "Names please." Daven replied, "Daven Kat and Kit Addison." The manager looked at the list and made a check mark. Afterwards he said, "You are the tenth contestant please go to the waiting area and we will set you up with your first match.." Daven did as he was told and waited.
After about a half hour later his munber was called and he was ready to fight. Daven being a ninja was a very experienced fighter that knew his skills well. Kit was a dancer that wasn't trained as a fighter, but her ability to throw fire and her agility from dancing makes up for her inexperience. Daven was ready as well as Kit.
Daven walked into the arena and waited to see his opponent enter the arena. He waited when suddenly an announcer shouted, " Ladies and gentlemen we present to you a battle of strength and wits! Welcome to the Golden Knights arena. After the announcer got done talking a door opened and released a bear.
The bear wasn't a normal bear. It had claws and fur, but the tail was long and spikey. Daven hasn't seen this type of bear before but he knew that he had to fight it the first round. The bear roared and got on it's fours. Kit said, "Are you ready? It's about to charge!"
The bear charged but Daven teleported behind it. Kit threw a fireball. The bear was dazed yet it didn't catch on fire. It missed Kit because of this and Daven followed up by throwing a ninja star. The bear turned around and saw the ninja star. The ninja star got stuck into it's skull but didn't affect the bear too much. The bear was furious.

What happens next?
141.title: A Bear

choices: Daven missed but Kit threw a fireball
1411.content:
Continue
Daven and the monster bear
Daven knew at this point that the bear had a strength advantage over both him and Kit. Knowing this meant that he could only take down the bear by out smarting it. The bear charged at him.
Kit watched Daven teleport away like last time but she knew that something more had to be done in order to defeat the bear. The bear hit the wall and got stuck because of the ninja star stuck in its head. This was their chance to make a move.
Daven appeared next to Kit.
Daven: So what do we do, this thing is clearly stronger than us.
Kit: Its head is stuck in the wall which gives us an advantage.
The bear was still struggling to get out the wall. There was something odd glowing underneath it.
Kit: (notices the glowing ball) Hmm, do you see that ball there?
Daven: How could I miss it? What do you have in mind.
Kit: Let's see what happens if we can hit it.
Daven: Ah, it might be a weak spot. Gotcha.
Kit: Let's go!
The bear managed to pry itself out of the wall. It was furious but didn't see Daven nor Kit. Confused, it looked around frantically. Daven and Kit were both behind it.
Daven waited for the glowing ball to be shown again. It was and he threw another star at it.

What happens next?
1411.title: Continue

145.content:
Continue
Kit and Daven
Daven walks into the arena not expecting much. He brought his new ninja suit and classic katana and a small shuriken. Today was a unusual day because he was ready to fight.
He walked into the arena and sees nothing but open space and a large crowd. He was excited to face his next challenge for arena battles were not new to him.
He stands there feeling confident to bring his girl friend, Kit a new trophy. However he didn't know who or what he was going to face. What was mere minutes felt like hours to him as he anxiously listens to the announcer introduce his opponent.
The gates open and Daven sees a womanly figure walk into the scene. He gets ready for he doesn't know what is going to happen next. The figure was wearing a red robe with a hood and carrying a small dagger. He waited patiently for the figure to introduce herself. The opponent took off her hood and it revealed a face with blue eyes. It was Kit.
Daven's eyes widened in shock for he knew that he didn't want to harm one of his best friends. He wasn't afraid to fight a girl for he has done it before, but he was afraid of hurting his friend. Kit looked and saw the expression on his face. She didn't know that she was going to fight her boy friend Daven. They were both in a bad situation.
Daven: What, Kit what are you doing here.
Kit: I should ask you the same.
Daven: They tricked us!
Kit: Yeah but there is only one way out. (pulls out her dagger)
Daven: Wait we need a plan first.
Kit: (winks at him) Way ahead of you.
Daven: (knowing that she won't really hurt him) Ah, now let's make this convincing.

What happens next?
145.title: Kit
